Class HandleSMTP

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Controller.smtp.HandleSMTP
public class HandleSMTP extends Object
Backend service for handling SMTP and IMAP operations. Manages email connection, fetching, sending, and updating status.

      public HandleSMTP()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String email, String password)
      Stores the user credentials for the session.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      password - The user's application password.
      Returns:
      true (always marks credentials as stored).

    • isCredentialsValid

      public boolean isCredentialsValid()
      Checks if the stored credentials have been marked as valid.
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise.

    • setCurrentFolder

      public void setCurrentFolder(String folderName)
      Sets the current IMAP folder to work with.
      Parameters:
      folderName - The name of the folder (e.g., "INBOX").

    • getCurrentFolder

      public String getCurrentFolder()
      Gets the current IMAP folder name.
      Returns:
      The folder name.

    • getAvailableFolders

      public List<String> getAvailableFolders()
      Retrieves the list of available folders from the IMAP server.
      Returns:
      A list of folder names.

    • fetchEmails

      public List<EmailModel> fetchEmails()
      Fetches the latest 50 emails from the current folder.
      Returns:
      A list of EmailModel objects.

    • loadFullContent

      public void loadFullContent(EmailModel emailModel)
      Loads the full content (body and attachments) of a specific email.
      Parameters:
      emailModel - The EmailModel to populate with content.

    • updateReadStatusIMAP

      public void updateReadStatusIMAP(String uid, boolean markAsRead)
      Updates the SEEN flag (read status) of an email on the IMAP server.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique ID of the email.
      markAsRead - true to mark as read, false to mark as unread.

    • deleteEmail

      public void deleteEmail(String uid)
      Marks an email as deleted on the IMAP server.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique ID of the email to delete.

    • downloadEmailComplete

      public void downloadEmailComplete(String uid, File destinationFile) throws Exception
      Downloads an email and saves it to a local file.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique ID of the email.
      destinationFile - The file to save the email to.
      Throws:
      Exception - If download fails or email is not found.

    • sendEmail

      public void sendEmail(String recipient, String subject, String body, List<File> attachments) throws Exception
      Sends an email with optional attachments.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The recipient's email address.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      body - The body content of the email.
      attachments - A list of files to attach.
      Throws:
      Exception - If sending fails.
